job.title: Independent Web Developer
job.description: Need a website? You're in the right place. Contact me to turn your idea into reality!

services.title: Services I Offer
services.description1: I have a **web developer certification** and create **comprehensive** websites.
services.description2: It would be an honor to help you create the website you need to boost your business!

design.title: Sleek Design
design.description: Modern and aesthetic designs tailored to your preferences.
design.subtitle: Tools Used

dev.title: Clean Code
dev.description: Websites that are responsive, fast, and secure.

contact.title: Always Available
contact.description: No worries if you need changes or run into issues; we'll stay in touch.

portfolio.title: My Portfolio
portfolio.description1: Take a look at some of my **previous projects** to get an idea of what's possible. Feel free to check out the **source code** on my Github; it's all public.
portfolio.description2: These are demonstration sites; they're not fully functional!

form.title: Contact Me
form.description1: Feel free to send me an email, **contact** me on my various social media platforms, or use this form if you have any **questions** or want more information.
form.description2: I'll respond as quickly as possible!
form.name: Your Full Name
